resources.string: The aluminum case is lightweight and made from 100 percent recycled aerospace-grade alloy. The Sport Band is made from a durable yet surprisingly soft high-performance fluoroelastomer with an innovative pin-and-tuck closure.

The Samsung Galaxy Watch4 connected watch, powered by Android Wear 3.0, offers you ideal access to the Google universe while offering a 1.2" Super Amoled screen, a large storage capacity and precise monitoring of your sports activities, your health and your sleep.

1.39 inch 326 ppi high resolution display - Keep an eye on your health The always-on display function allows you to see the time, even in direct sunlight. Clearly displays incoming calls, notifications, fitness and other important information.

The Amazfit Bip U is a connected watch designed for sport and to monitor its performance thanks to its integrated GPS and its 60 sports modes. This training partner has many features ideal for your sports and daily activities.
